info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 10:52AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of south central Lake, northeastern Missoula and southeastern Sanders Counties through 1130 AM MST... At 1050 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an intense snow shower from Evaro north to Dixon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. Expect rapidly changing road conditions. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Ravalli, St. Ignatius, Arlee, Old Agency, Evaro and Dixon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
